events.name: Charmed, Enchanted, and Spellbound
events.description: Learn about the sometimes strange and disgusting world of selling people false hope in the form of love spells. Please join us in one of our three Back Parlors for this event.

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy
events.description: Join DJ Mercy Maelica in one of our Grand Ballrooms all night long.

events.name: Elder Goth Night
events.description: In our newly renovated Second Grand Ballroom join DJ Kittybot for an ALL VINYL goth/industrial favorites set

events.name: The Satanic Chef--Live!
events.description: The Satanic Chef live, is a live, interactive-cooking class on TSTVHQ. In these classes I combine unique cooking style in an entertaining & educating satanic context. Available in one of our three (3!) kitchens!

events.name: NSFW Live Drawing with Zoey Inferni
events.description: Zoey Inferni of TSTIN (@TheSphinxDen on Twitter) will be illustrating a sexy, kinky Baphomet pinup for Lupercalia! Come hang out, chat, watch the debauchery, and celebrate sexual liberation. 18+ only. Also available in the Garden and Ritual Chamber.

events.name: Asexuality: A Panel Discussion with Audience Q&A
events.description: Want to know more about Asexuality? Class is in session in ALL THREE(3!) Infernal Theaters with Bill and Veronica from Satanic Study Hall! Join our panel representing the asexuality spectrum Helle Bent, Azura Rose and Attar B'alam, lead by Bill and Veronica. Audience Q&A to follow.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: A Happy Hooven Home: Goats!
events.description: Livestream of goats. Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: Lupercalia Wolves!
events.description: Livestream of wolves. Donate at nywolf.org

events.name: Late Night Library: Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
